no-any.message: Avoid using 'any' type. Use more specific types instead.

explicit-return-type.message: Functions should have explicit return types.

no-console.message: Avoid using console.log in production code. Use a logger instead.

hooks-order.message: React hooks should be called in the same order on every render.

no-direct-mutation.message: Don't mutate state directly. Use setState or a state management library.

jsx-key.message: Elements in iterators require a unique key prop.

prefer-functional.message: Prefer functional components over class components.

role-has-required-aria-props.message: Elements with ARIA roles must have all required attributes for that role.

no-large-bundles.message: Bundle size should be kept under 250KB.

optimize-images.message: Images should be optimized for web.

lazy-loading.message: Consider lazy loading for large components or images.
